details: The script is running an MPI application, specifically 'heat_stencil_1D_mpi'. It utilizes the OpenMPI library (version 3.1.6) compiled with GCC 12.2.0. The script requests a specific partition ('lva') for execution on a SLURM cluster. It allocates 64 tasks (processes) in total, with 12 tasks per node. The script also redirects output to a log file ('output.log').
